description: Test cases that should be rejected with clear error messages

expectedError.reason: No capability supports video playback functionality
expectedError.userMessage: Video player components are not currently supported.
suggestions: Use PowerApps built-in media controls for video playback

testCases.name: Forbidden behavior requested
testCases.userInput: Rating control that auto-submits to external API

expectedError.reason: External API calls are explicitly forbidden in star-rating capability
expectedError.userMessage: PCF components cannot make direct external API calls. They must work offline and use Dataverse for data operations.
expectedError.alternative: Use PCF data binding to update Dataverse fields, then use Power Automate for external integrations

expectedError.reason: Component name must start with a letter (PCF_NAMING_001)
expectedError.userMessage: Component names must be valid TypeScript class names starting with a letter.
Cannot generate a component for this request. No matching capability found.
Star animations cannot exceed 500ms due to performance requirements.
expectedError.alternative: Use CSS transitions limited to 200-300ms for optimal user experience

testCases.name: CDN dependency requested
testCases.userInput: Rating using Font Awesome icons from CDN

expectedError.reason: External CDN dependencies are forbidden (security and offline requirements)
expectedError.userMessage: PCF components cannot load resources from external CDNs.
expectedError.alternative: Use inline SVG or bundle icon resources with the component

expectedError.reason: Cannot determine component type from input
expectedError.userMessage: Please provide more details about what type of component you need.
expectedError.clarificationNeeded: What should this component do? (e.g., collect ratings, display data, allow selection)

expectedError.reason: Conflicting interactivity requirements: cannot be both read-only and editable
expectedError.clarificationNeeded: Should this control be editable by users or display-only?

testCases.name: Security violation
testCases.userInput: Rating that executes custom JavaScript from user input

expectedError.reason: Security rule violation: eval() and dynamic code execution forbidden (PCF_SECURITY_002)
expectedError.userMessage: Components cannot execute arbitrary code due to Content Security Policy requirements.

testCases.name: Accessibility violation
testCases.userInput: Rating control with no keyboard support

expectedError.reason: Accessibility rule violation: keyboard navigation required (PCF_A11Y_001)
expectedError.userMessage: All interactive PCF components must support keyboard navigation per WCAG 2.1 Level A requirements.
